channel.title: Shop issue
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I have a Slayer Master who gives tasks, and I get slayer points per task so that's all working. However I can't get my slayer master to have on his second option (trade) first option talk works perfect. I can't get a shop to get opened when I click on trade, anyone has some suggestions how I can fix this? So I can make a shop where I can spend slayer points.
I have a PI-based server.

item.title: Shop issue
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

If you want to make it open on first click go into actionhandler.java and search-

Then underneath switch(npcType) {
add in

Case ####: c.getShops().openShop(*); break;
#### = Npc ID * = The Shop number.

Read full topic
